channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Black wire dumped on grass verge in Bournewood Road, 24th December
item.description:
Black wire dumped at the top end of Bournewood Road on left on grass verge have included the road sign where the wire is dumped roughly thx

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bournewood Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Residents at Adam House Donestic Waste, 24th December
item.description:
Residents at Adam House continue to use the public footpath for their bin storage, and dumped household items. This is an ongoing issue, that needs proper enforcement as it will cause other residents to do the same

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kent House Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No entry signs covered in black plastic, 24th December
item.description:
After the recent gas works in Miles Street, the black plastic temporarily put over the No Entry signs at the entrance to Miles Street from Wandsworth Road was not removed. This is a traffic hazard as those exiting from Miles Street have previously been in what was a one way street.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-3, Miles Street, Vauxhall, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street Light not working, 24th December
item.description:
Street Light not working despite it being reported as Fixed twice since the original report in October 2025. Unfortunately making false claims undermines confidence in the whole process. In other words: What's the point of reporting a problem if nothing is being done about the issue, and the official response is not true. I have staff who leave in the dark on an unlit pavement, that's why this important to us.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Wandsworth Road, Vauxhall, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole next to manhole being eroded by large buses, 24th December
item.description:
Large road pothole adjacent to manhole cover that is being runover constantly and is therefore getting worse rapidly. Causing huge road noise and vibration within properties due to the heavy buses going over it regularly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 45A, Mayplace Road East, Barnehurst, Bexleyheath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped outside HMO again, 24th December
item.description:
More rubbish dumped out 61 Hearns Road a HMO. Rubbish is now blowing down the street. It is blocking the pavement. Rubbish needs to be removed. It has appeared there overnight. Residents of this Hmo need to be spoken to this is the 2nd incident of dumping in 2 weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 55, Hearns Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
